overview:
Spotzot helps retailers, e-tailers and product brands drive mobile shoppers to nearby stores and e-commerce sites through contextually relevant advertising that matches their location and shopping interest. Spotzot’s dynamically generated, precision-targeted SpotAds connect with consumers at the most active stage in the purchase funnel through leading mobile shopping, search, and location-aware applications and web sites.

ADVERTISERS   SpotAds provide two ways for advertisers to target shoppers:   

Exclusive SpotAds provide a dedicated brand experience for retailers and e-tailers that want to promote their offers free of competing ads. Exclusive SpotAds dynamically convert the most relevant regularly priced and discounted promotional merchandise into compelling catalogs of offers grouped by category and price that match each shopper’s interest and location.   Non-exclusive SpotAds enable retailers, e-tailers and product brands to display their sponsored performance and impression-based ads among other results that match the shopper’s interest.   

PUBLISHERS   Monetize your app or web site with Spotzot’s SpotAds. Spotzot drives shopper engagement, stickiness and monetization by providing the #1 source of retail in-store and online product offers, promotions and coupons for the top 1,000 retail chains, valid at 500,000 store locations and online. Publishers can access Spotzot’s free APIs designed to support a wide range of smartphone, tablet and web shopping experiences.

Based in Santa Clara, California, Spotzot www.spotzot.com was founded in 2009 by a team of entrepreneurs with expertise in search, e-commerce, advertising, publishing and software from industry leaders Google, eBay, Verisign, Selectica, ADP, Yahoo, Adsoft Direct and eFrontier. Current Spotzot promotions and coupons can be viewed on mobile devices at m.spotzot.com or on the web at http://www.spotzot.com/main/.
